data.message: We already know it's recyclable... NOW WHY DONT YOU USE RECYCLED PLASTIC!!! Stop trying to paint yourselves as the good guys!

replies.message: Did you not read the part where it says its made out of Recycled plastic?

James Hudson  show me where it says it's made from recycled material, I read, and I quote "made from 100% recyclable material." That means it's recyclable, not that it has been recycled. 
They play on words to make you think it's good but it's not.

Hi JC, for the last five years we’ve been using 25% recycled plastic across all our brands, a figure we want to increase to 50% by 2020, but there’s not enough recycled plastic to go beyond that in Great Britain at the moment.
Coca-Cola  why don't you put a video up showing that instead? That would be far more believable than copying and pasting.
James Hudson not being able to tell that having bottles that are 'recyclable' is not the same thing as being 'of recycled plastic'
